mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_ID, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, FOOD_ID, REVIEW_RATING, REVIEW_IMG_PATH) VALUES(REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId},#{reviewTitle},#{reviewContent},#{foodId},#{reviewRating},#{reviewImgPath} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM REVIEW WHERE FOOD_ID = #{foodId} ORDER BY REVIEW_ID DESC
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM REVIEW ORDER BY REVIEW_ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
